name: Mount Dragonjaw
uniques: Grants [Formation I] ([bonus vs mounted units]) to adjacent [{Military} {Land}] units for the rest of the game

civilopediaText.text:
Ancient Dragon spitting fire, scorching the land beyond the sea, turning them into deserts.
When the dragon died, it's body got burried under the moving landmasses. Only the jaws remain above the surface.
